long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SnipSum is a powerful Chrome extension that instantly summarizes web content, helping you save time and get to the point faster. Whether you're reading articles, research papers, or any other text-heavy website, SnipSum condenses the content into clear, concise summaries with just a right-click.

What makes SnipSum stand out?

Time-Saving Summaries: Skip the long reads and get straight to the key points.
Translate Summarized Content: Instantly translate your summarized text into your preferred language for a more personalized experience.
Context-Aware Summaries: Highlights and full-page content are summarized accurately with attention to context.
Seamless Experience: Works on any website, making it a versatile tool for daily browsing.
AI-Powered Precision: Powered by OpenAI’s cutting-edge technology for smart and relevant summaries.
Install SnipSum today and start browsing smarter—because your time matters
